entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 77 %

Wind: NNE 3 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h except west 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait in the morning. High 9 with temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
